text: @DineshDSouza She, that idiot woman, getting in the police officer’s face, should be arrested for threatening his life with the coronavirus infection, not to mention his family. Where is Dr. Fauci, why is he not speaking out? This is outrageous behavior and should not be allowed. Hypocrisy!!
